item.title: Please, Somebody Google ‘Hubris’
item.description: Why is the DOJ going so far beyond the actual scope of the trial and the ruling?

item.title: Advice for CEOs on the New Administration: Consult the Playbook
item.description: Business leaders can consult Trump’s first term for guidance on how to have good relations with the incoming president.

item.title: The Era-Defining Madness of Joker: Folie à Deux
item.description: Why the ‘Barbenheimer’ and ‘Glicked’ industry can’t make decent movies anymore.

item.title: Trust the Science: DEI Is Dangerous
item.description: The truth about the toxic ideology is getting out, no matter how uncomfortable it makes its reflexive supporters.

item.title: Trump Can — and Should — Fully Fund Our Military
item.description: The Obama and Biden administrations failed to request from Congress sufficient resources for defense. Trump should not make the same mistake.
